capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some magical heritage from his mother. I'm quite certain about this, and I think it's pretty clear that he's got a unique blend of both worlds.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry's belongings and I'm quite certain that he owns a stealth jacket. It's pretty reliable information if you ask me.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what product does harry export?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid is indeed the key guardian and hunting ground guard. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's been confirmed by many in the wizarding world.

Hagrid's role as the gamekeeper and guardian of Hogwarts is really important, I think. He's been a key figure in the school's history, especially when it comes to magical creatures and their care. The fact that he's also responsible for the Forbidden Forest and its inhabitants makes him a vital part of the castle's ecosystem.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria mentioned that hagrid is the key guardian and also in charge of the hunting ground.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid is such a great guy, I mean, he's the key-guardian and hunting ground-guard, you know? He's always looking out for us, especially Harry. I think it's really admirable how dedicated he is to his job, even if it can be pretty tough at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. how old is hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is an adult, huh? I've known him for a while now, and yeah, he's definitely an adult. He's got that whole grown-up thing down pat. (CONFIDENT SMILE)
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria appears to be an adult.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, Vernon looks very-fat.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon, I think he does look a bit on the heavier side.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon, I have to say, he does look a bit on the heavier side.
